text: Saarbrücken (; ; Rhine Franconian: Saarbrigge [zaːˈbʁɪɡə]; ) is a German city and a district in the state of Saarland. The city is also the capital of the Saarland. Saarbrücken has 180,000 inhabitants. It is on the Saar River. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Saarbrücken (district) Category:States of the Holy Roman Empire Category:German state capitals
title: Saarbrücken
